title: Client doesn't start up
body:
So, I 've played League 5 hours ago. It played just fine without any problems. But then I went to sleep. I woke up and tried to start League up but instead I get this http://i.imgur.com/XLbmQwJ.png 
What might be the problem and how can I fix this?

replies.body: Damnit, it looks like the patcher kernels are on strike again! They probably didn't get administrator privileges, so they're having a _riot_.  No worries, a little negotiating through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) article will set things straight.  Everyone will leave satisfied!

If you are using windows and it updated to windows 10 anniversary update 1607 this may be your problem. it's easily fixed by going into properties then selecting  the compatibility tab. In that tab there's a section that is titled compatibility mode. In that section, check "Run this program in compatibility mode for:" and make sure windows 7 is selected. Click apply and open the client. It will prompt you if it can make changes to your computer and choose yes. I hope this fix your problem. Cheers.
